name: Forgotten Hills
description:
Forgotten Hills is an atmospheric horror themed playabe teaser created as an artistic challenge for the Lost Relic community.

Player controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Look
  • Shift - Run
  • Space - Jump

Application controls:

  • Home - Restart
  • PageUp - Switch camera
  • Insert - Free play / on rails
  • End - Mouse lock / unlock
  • Escape - Quit

Recommended minimum requirements to run teaser:

  • Intel i7 cpu (or equivalent)
  • Nvidia RTX 2080 (or equivalent)
  • 16gb RAM
